A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson understandably took some risks with the new installment in the Star Wars franchise\, and it definitely shows. This movie\, while having it's low points\, definitely hits more than misses. While sticking with the same characters\, this movie is more centralized on character development rather than establishing a universe. If you're a Star Wars fan\, or even just a movie movie fan in general\, I'd certainly recommend giving this one a watch.
